div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2114 Campobello di Licata, 20 km. N of (195) Licata, 1912 Burial: 400-390 B.C.? (K) Contents: 100-200 AR Panormus: tetradr. (presumably Ziz issues) Syracuse: tetradr. (incl. issues signed by Phrygillos and Eucleidas' facing Athe- na) Carthage: tetradr. (early Siculo-Punic is- sues?) Athens: tetradr. Disposition: J. Hirsch, part; Syracuse, 5 tetradr. of Syracuse Orsi's notes Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, p. 224
